title: Week 3: January 12–18 - Genesis 1–2; Moses 2–3; Abraham 4–5
content:
# Jesus Created a Beautiful World for Us!

## Lesson Overview
Jesus created the beautiful world for us to enjoy and care for. We can thank Him by loving His creations.

## TEACHER LESSON (8-10 minutes)
**Get Attention (1-2 minutes):** Hold up a shiny apple or flower. "Look at this pretty thing! Who made it?" Let kids shout "Jesus!"

**Simple Story (3-4 minutes):** Use pictures of sun, animals, plants. Act it out: Wiggle fingers for light ("Let there be light!"), roar like animals, wave arms like trees. "Jesus created day and night, sky and sea, plants and animals, just like in Genesis 1 and Moses 2. He made a beautiful world!"

**Big Idea (2-3 minutes):** Repeat 3 times: "Jesus created the world for us! Jesus created the world for us! Jesus created the world for us!" Point to kids: "He made YOU special too!"

**We Can Do This (1-2 minutes):** "We can say thank you by picking up toys and being kind to animals, just like caring for God's creations (Genesis 1:28)."

## Wiggle Activity (2-3 minutes)
Sing "My Heavenly Father Loves Me" (CS, 228-29) while marching around the room. Point to eyes, ears, mouth as you sing. Add jumps for "He gave me my eyes that I might see."

## Simple Scripture
"God created... man in his own image" (Genesis 1:27).  
*Say together 3 times with motions: Point up for God, hug self for "man," mirror pose for "image."*

## Fun Activities (15 minutes total)
**1. Creation Object Lesson (3 minutes)**  
*Materials:* Rock, feather, leaf, toy fish.  
*Steps:* 1. Pass items around. 2. Ask "Who made this?" 3. Say "Jesus!"  
*Say:* "Jesus made rocks, birds, trees, fish (Moses 2)! Feel how special!"  

**2. Animal Freeze Dance Game (4 minutes)**  
*Materials:* None.  
*Steps:* 1. Play music, dance like animals Jesus made. 2. Freeze when music stops. 3. Shout "Jesus made me!"  
*Say:* "Dance like lions, birds, fish from Genesis 1! Jesus created them for us!"  

**3. Draw God's World Craft (4 minutes)**  
*Materials:* Paper, crayons.  
*Steps:* 1. Draw one thing Jesus made (sun, flower, you!). 2. Add sticker heart. 3. Share with friend.  
*Say:* "Draw something beautiful Jesus created (Abraham 4). Take it home to remember!"  

**4. Body Puzzle Hands-On (4 minutes)**  
*Materials:* Pre-drawn body outlines cut into 4-5 pieces per child.  
*Steps:* 1. Mix pieces. 2. Put puzzle together. 3. Say "I'm made in God's image!"  
*Say:* "We are like Heavenly Father (Moses 2:26-27)! Puzzle shows we are special."  

## Picture Time
Show "The Creation" by Annie Henrie Nader (Gospel Art Book). Ask: "What do you see Jesus making?" "How does it make you feel happy?" "What would you thank Jesus for?"

## Song
"My Heavenly Father Loves Me" (CS, 228-29). Add actions: Clap for mountains, flap arms for birds, touch heart for love.

## Snack Idea
Goldfish crackers. "Jesus made fish in the sea (Genesis 1)! Crunch and say thank you."

## Testimony Moment
"I know Jesus created this beautiful world and loves each of you so much." Invite: Fold arms and say together, "Jesus made me special. I love Jesus!"

## Teacher Survival Tips
1. If a child wiggles, give a job like holding a picture.  
2. Use timer for activities—sing a quick song to switch.  
3. If short on time, skip one activity and add more song time.
